text: when using HubDB have the empty values when imported set to null or give option to to do so

<@U2H3TT8F2> can you describe this a bit more? Any values you don’t set should be null. Do you mean that if you’re importing a text column from a CSV and it’s empty “a,b,,c” it will make third column null here rather than an empty string?
Can we make the column headings in the HubDB sticky so when we are scrolling down the db we know what columns are which?

OH SHIT. I just figured they would do that on their own. this is the worst part of hubdb. But I also export the hubdb and then reimport after making changes.. so things like content editor, html editor etc dont' really phase me, but I see the need for it
Omg yes column headings.... Can't tell you how many times I've scrolled over a thousand rows back up to see what I'm looking at
